title: Bandie
cast: Uttam Kumar, Sulakshana Pandit, Utpal Dutt, Bindu, Amjad Khan, Helen, Indrani Mukherjee, Padma Khanna, Iftekhar
description: Heirless Maharaj Brajbhan leaves his throne to his cousin Vikram, but when Brajbhan's wife, Badi Rani, finally conceives, Vikram plots to destroy her.

title: Benji's Very Own Christmas Story
cast: Ron Moody, Patsy Garrett, Cynthia Smith
description: While on a press tour, Benji goes behind the scenes of Santa's workshop. But Santa has a devastating secret, so it's up to Benji to save Christmas.

title: Flying Guillotine 2
cast: Feng Ku, Chung Wang, Szu Shih, Lung Ti, Lo Lieh, Szu-Chia Chen
description: The emperor's reign of terror expands. Heroic outlaw Ma Teng joins a squad of female rebels, whose leader is torn between family loyalties.

title: Grease
cast: John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Barry Pearl, Michael Tucci, Kelly Ward, Didi Conn, Jamie Donnelly, Dinah Manoff, Eve Arden, Dody Goodman, Sid Caesar, Joan Blondell, Frankie Avalon
description: John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John star in this hit musical comedy about a greaser and the good girl he falls for – much to his friends' chagrin.

title: The Five Venoms
cast: Philip Kwok, Chien Sun, Sheng Chiang, Feng Lu, Meng Lo, Pai Wei, Lung Wei Wang, Feng Ku, Shu Pei Sun, Sun Chien
listed_in: Action & Adventure, Cult Movies, International Movies
description: A dying kung fu master sends his last student to track down five former pupils in order to learn which one of them has become evil.

title: The spiral
cast: Jan Nowicki, Maja Komorowska, Zofia Kucówna, Aleksander Bardini, Jan Świderski, Seweryna Broniszówna, Piotr Garlicki, Marian Glinka
description: When an unbearable stranger arrives at a winter mountain resort and vanishes overnight, his dark past comes to light.
